Speak("Ah, you want to delve deeper into the digits of Pi? Very well, up to 13 decimal places, it is approximately 3.1415926535897.  Remember, true mastery lies in understanding its significance, not just memorizing its digits. What else can I help you with? Anything else?")

Speak("Ah, you seek even more precision! Up to 18 decimal places, Pi is approximately 3.141592653589793238. Remember, my friend, the pursuit of knowledge is a journey, not a destination. What else can I help you with? Anything else?")

Speak("Ah, you seek even more precision! Up to 20 decimal places, Pi is approximately 3.14159265358979323846.  Remember, my friend, the pursuit of knowledge is a journey, not a destination. What else can I help you with? Anything else?")
